about_the_game: Rooftop Renegade Original Soundtrack+ expands all of your favourite in-game tracks into album versions for a new listening experience created by composer John Oestmann. Disc 1 includes a Continuous Mix curated to be a journey of its own. Disc 2 contains all expanded tracks making up the core game soundtrack. Disc 3 contains the bonuses - unheard Beta tracks and loopable versions of tracks to cater for all listening styles.
detailed_description: Rooftop Renegade Original Soundtrack+ expands all of your favourite in-game tracks into album versions for a new listening experience created by composer John Oestmann. Disc 1 includes a Continuous Mix curated to be a journey of its own. Disc 2 contains all expanded tracks making up the core game soundtrack. Disc 3 contains the bonuses - unheard Beta tracks and loopable versions of tracks to cater for all listening styles.
name: Rooftop Renegade Original Soundtrack+

Minimum:
  • Storage: 258 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2080 MB available space
